translation.en: Welcome to the store. Are you a Busy Beaver?
translation.es: Bienvenido a la tienda. ¿Eres un Castor Constructor?

translation.en: No, I am not a Busy Beaver.
translation.es: No, no soy un Castor Constructor.

translation.en: Join our rewards club for savings.
translation.es: Ahorra uniéndote al club de recompensas.

translation.en: You can get your teeth into our dam good deals.
translation.es: Clava los dientes en nuestras peludas promociones.

translation.en: If you need help, ask a Beaver.
translation.es: Si necesitas ayuda, dile a un Castor. -Muy bien. -Claro.

translation.en: Hey. Oh. Can I, uh, help you with that, sir?
Do you think I don't know how to cut rope?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no sé cortar una cuerda?

translation.en: No, it's just we usually do that for ya.
translation.es: No, pero eso lo hacemos nosotros.

translation.en: Do you think I'm gonna cut myself and bleed all over your floor and sue you?
translation.es: ¿Crees que me cortaré, que me desangraré aquí y los demandaré?

translation.en: Then I don't need your help.
Did you, um, find everything you were lookin' for today?
You charged me for 6 feet of rope.
I didn't get 2 yards. I got 5 feet.
Yeah, we don't charge by the foot. We charge by the yard.
translation.es: No cobramos por pie. Cobramos por yarda.

translation.en: 99¢ a yard is 33¢ a foot, times 5, that's 1.65.
translation.es: Noventa y nueve centavos por yarda son 33 centavos por pie, por cinco, son 1.65.

translation.en: No, I know, but I can't put it into the computer the way that you just said.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero no puedo ingresarlo en la computadora... ...como usted lo dijo.

translation.en: What the hell kind of computer can't do simple math?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de computadora no puede hacer cuentas?

translation.en: - Can I speak to your manager? - He's at lunch.
Lunch. All anyone cares about these days is lunch.
translation.es: Comiendo. Solo eso les importa ahora.

translation.en: - Is there anyone else in charge? - You want the assistant manager?
translation.es: -¿Hay alguien más a cargo? -¿Como la subgerente?

translation.en: - Yes, I'd like the assistant manager. - 'Kay.
This is the assistant manager? How old is she?
Shouldn't you be in gym class?
Let me cover that extra 33¢ for you.
Sir, I do not want your 33¢. And this is not about 33¢.
translation.es: Señor, no quiero sus 33 centavos. Y no es por el dinero.

translation.en: This is about the fact that I got 5 feet of rope because I want 5 feet of rope.
translation.es: Es por el hecho... ...de que llevo 5 pies de cuerda porque eso necesito.

translation.en: And I shouldn't have to pay for 6 feet of rope if I don't want 6 feet.
translation.es: Y no debería pagar 6 pies de cuerda si no los necesito.

translation.en: Did you want another foot of rope?

translation.es: Si No VIVES Aquí No Tires Nada En Estos Botes ¡NUNCA! La bici debe ir acá.

translation.en: - It belongs in the bike rack. - I was only gone half a minute.
translation.es: -Va en el aparcabicis. -La dejé medio minuto.

translation.en: Next time, I'll lock it up in the lost and found.
translation.es: A la próxima, la pondré en objetos perdidos.

translation.en: Don't you dare let that little rat dog piss on my walkway again.
translation.es: Ni de broma dejes que esa rata vuelva a orinar en mi acera.

translation.en: - I know it was you. - Ignore him, Prince.
He's a nasty, bitter old man. And he has no idea who's doing that.
translation.es: Es un anciano amargado. Y no tiene idea de quién fue.

translation.en: Well, it was one of you.
And tell that useless boyfriend of yours to stop stretching his groin in public.
translation.es: Y dile al inútil de tu novio que deje de exhibirse en público.

translation.en: Looks like a 14- year- old Romanian gymnast, for God's sakes.
translation.es: Parece un gimnasta rumano de 14 años, caramba.

translation.en: There he is, the big man himself.
It's, well, retirement cake, I guess. Call it what you like.
translation.es: Es un pastel de jubilación. Dile como quieras.
La empresa reconoce a Otto DIVIÉRTETE!!!

translation.en: Have fun with the rest of your life. We wanted to, you know...
translation.es: Diviértete el resto de tu vida. Queríamos, ya sabes...

translation.en: Yes! Well, no. Give you a nice send- off.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Bueno, no. Darte una linda despedida.

translation.en: You're the one who decided to leave.
And you did get a nice severance package.
translation.es: Y te dimos una buena indemnización.

translation.en: You took me off Operations. You cut back on my hours.
translation.es: Me retiraste de operaciones. Me recortaste las horas.

translation.en: You made Terry, who I trained, my supervisor.
translation.es: Nombraste a Terry mi supervisor y yo lo capacité.

translation.en: Terry, who can barely figure out what year it is without his phone.
translation.es: Terry, que no sabe ni en qué año vive sin su teléfono.

translation.en: So, yes, I took the severance package.
translation.es: Sí, claro que acepté la indemnización.

translation.en: I'm sorry you see it that way.
We all had to adjust after the merger.
translation.es: Tuvimos que adaptarnos después de la fusión.

translation.en: But you've been quite an asset to this company over the years, so--
translation.es: Pero fuiste muy valioso para la empresa durante años, así que...

translation.en: We're gonna miss those schedules of yours.
Okay, Otto. Want a piece of your face?
No, no, no. Hey, you cannot use this road without a permit.
translation.es: ¡No, no, no! ¡No puedes usar esta calle sin permiso!

translation.en: I'm not parking. I just dropped off a package.
translation.es: No me estacioné. Solo dejé un paquete.

translation.en: The sign doesn't say anything about packages, does it?
translation.es: El letrero no dice nada sobre eso, ¿o sí?

translation.en: It says permits and you don't have one.
translation.es: Dice permiso y tú no tienes.

translation.en: This is not a through street.
Every time you come in here
that means one of the residents can't park in front of their homes!
The other guys don't do this. The guys with the white trucks.
translation.es: Los otros no hacen eso. Los de los camiones blancos.

translation.en: How come it's always you brown guys?
And I don't mean that racially!
Oh, hi. Sorry, can you hear me? Yes.
I have great news about your health insurance.
translation.es: Le tengo buenas noticias sobre su seguro médico.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Robot, robot, robot!
Well, who do I have to talk to to get this phone number disconnected?
translation.es: ¿Con quién tengo que hablar para cancelar este número?

translation.en: Can you transfer me or should I press a number?
translation.es: ¿Usted me transfiere o presiono un número?

translation.en: Well, I have been listening to that music for seven minutes.
I would like the electricity shut off at this residence.
translation.es: Quiero cancelar la electricidad de este domicilio.

translation.en: - Are you moving home? - No, I am canceling the account.
translation.es: -¿Se va a mudar? -No, cancelaré la cuenta.

translation.en: A- N- D- E- R- S- O- N.
And why can't you refund me for the six days?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no puede reembolsarme los 6 días?

translation.en: Well, my policy is that if I'm going to pay for six days of gas,
translation.es: Pues mi política es que si voy a pagar 6 días de gas...

translation.en: then I will use six days of gas.
Back. You're in the blind spot, be careful. Use the Force.
translation.es: Reversa. Tienes un punto ciego, cuidado. Usa la Fuerza.

translation.en: Good, good. No, you're going on the sidewalk.
translation.es: -Bien. No, te subiste a la acera. -Ay, no.

translation.en: What the hell is he doing?
Yes! Exactly! That's exactly what I was saying.
- Hey, you can't just drive here. -
translation.es: Oye, no se puede manejar aquí.

translation.en: I'm not driving. Am I driving the car? No.
translation.es: Yo no manejo. ¿Estoy en el auto? No.

translation.en: You can't just bring a car on this street without a permit.
translation.es: No pueden meter un auto aquí sin permiso.

translation.en: No, we have a parking permit. Right here. See?
translation.es: No, tenemos permiso para estacionar. ¿Lo ve?

translation.en: What the hell's it doing in your pocket?!
translation.es: ¿Por qué diablos está en tu bolsillo?

translation.en: That doesn't mean you can back the trailer up to your front door.
translation.es: No por eso... ...pueden meter el remolque hasta su puerta.

translation.en: No, I wasn't. I was, uh, parallel parking.
translation.es: No hacía eso. Quería estacionarme en paralelo.

translation.en: Yeah, that, uh, didn't go so well, huh?
I'll just give it another try.
Keep backing away. Keep backing away.
The other way, but first the other way.
- No, no, no! Stop! Stop, stop, stop! Stop! -
- Stop! Stop. Get outta the car. -
- Get outta the car. - I'm sorry.
How you could make it this far through life
without knowing how to back up a trailer.
My God, a dog with one front paw and cataracts coulda done better than that.
translation.es: Un perro con una sola pata... ...y cataratas lo haría mejor.

translation.en: And an automatic, of course. Give me the keys.
translation.es: Y automática, claro. Dame las llaves.

translation.en: The trailer's too close to the side of the car.
translation.es: El remolque está muy cerca del costado.

translation.en: That's why it's still beeping, but--
translation.es: Por eso sigue sonando. La cuestión...

translation.en: I'm Abbie, O- T- T- O.
He just did it in one shot, huh?
Anyone who thinks they need to use radar to back up a car
translation.es: Quien crea que necesita un radar para ir en reversa...

translation.en: shouldn't be allowed to drive one.
They shouldn't be allowed to use the radio.
And the permit goes on the rearview mirror. Not in your pocket!
translation.es: Y el permiso va en el retrovisor. ¡No en el bolsillo!

translation.en: - Bye! Thank you! - Thank you, sir. That was very nice.
How much more shelf space is left?
- How many more boxes of books do you have? - Seven or eight.
translation.es: -¿Cuántas cajas más de libros hay? -Unas siete u ocho.

translation.en: Then I'll build you another bookcase.
Then I'll build you another bookcase.
Yeah, that's what I said. No? What did I say-- ?
It doesn't matter what you said. Otto. O- T- T- O.
translation.es: No importa lo que dijiste. Otto. O-T-T-O.

translation.en: Otto. Okay, so it's the same forward that is backwards.
translation.es: Otto. Bien, se dice igual al derecho que al revés.

translation.en: It's just you don't hear that name very often.
translation.es: Ese nombre no se usa mucho.

translation.en: Okay. If we're interrupting, we can always come back.
translation.es: Bueno. Si lo interrumpimos, podemos volver.

translation.en: That's why we go so well together.
translation.es: Por eso nos llevamos tan bien.

translation.en: She loves to cook, and I like to eat everything.
translation.es: Le encanta cocinar y a mí me encanta comer de todo.

translation.en: We wanted to properly introduce ourselves
because we're gonna be neighbors and everything, so...
- I'd say you're a little unfriendly. - I'm not unfriendly.
translation.es: -Sí es un poco antipático. -No lo soy.

translation.en: No, no, no, no. You're not unfriendly.
translation.es: No, no, no. No es antipático.

translation.en: Every word you say is like a warm cuddle. It really is.
translation.es: Todo lo que dice es miel sobre hojuelas. De verdad.

translation.en: Be careful with the salsa, please.
translation.es: Cuidado con la salsa, por favor.

translation.en: It's, um, pollo con mole. It's really good.
translation.es: Es pollo con mole. Es delicioso.

translation.en: It's a Mexican dish. I'm Mexican.
translation.es: Es un platillo mexicano. Soy mexicana.

translation.en: I was born in El Salvador because my father is from there.
translation.es: Nací en El Salvador, mi papá es de allá.

translation.en: But my mom is Mexican, so we went to first Mexico and then--
translation.es: Pero mi mamá es mexicana, primero nos fuimos a México y luego...

translation.en: - And you? - I'm an IT consultant.
Okay, well, I have some things I need to do.
You wouldn't have an Alvin wrench I could borrow, would you?
translation.es: ¿Tendrá una llave Alvin que me preste?

translation.en: It's Allen wrench, right? It's Allen wrench.
All morning, Alvin wrench, Alvin wrench.
Everybody else I know calls it an Alvin wrench.
translation.es: Todos mis conocidos la llaman Alvin.

translation.en: - Everybody else you know is wrong. - Oh, yeah? You wanna Google it?
translation.es: -Todos tus conocidos están mal. -¿Lo quieres googlear?

translation.en: No, my phone. You use your phone.
translation.es: No, el mío no. Usa el tuyo.

translation.en: Do you know what size you need?
We go because you have things to do, so...
translation.es: Lo dejamos para que haga sus cosas.

translation.en: That's a Chevy engine for you.
Not enough you can depend on in this world.
Maybe I should just run myself over with a car. That'll work.
translation.es: Mejor debería dejar que me atropellen. Eso no falla.

translation.en: Found some of the flowers you like.
translation.es: Encontré las flores que te gustan.
De oferta. Dos por ocho dólares.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't get 'em here earlier.
Didn't even know an Allen wrench from one of the Chipmunks.
translation.es: Cree que las llaves Allen se llaman Alvin.

translation.en: I know, I know. Maybe they can't afford to buy yet.
translation.es: Ya sé. Tal vez aún no pueden comprar.

translation.en: But what will they do when those real estate bastards
translation.es: ¿Pero qué van a hacer cuando las inmobiliarias...

translation.en: decide to tear down their house
translation.es: ...decidan demoler su casa... ...y hacer más condominios baratos?

translation.en: and put up more of those ricky- ticky condos, huh?
It's gonna happen. I promise you.
translation.es: Eso va a pasar. Te lo aseguro.

translation.en: They're already driving around the gates, driving right across the grass.
translation.es: Ya están evadiendo las barreras y pisoteando el pasto.

translation.en: What idiot thought that was a good name for a real estate company?
translation.es: ¿A qué idiota se le ocurrió ese gran nombre para una inmobiliaria?

translation.en: Can't even buy a decent screw hook anymore.
translation.es: Ya no se puede comprar ni un gancho decente.

translation.en: Nothing works when you're not home.
translation.es: Nada funciona si tú no estás.

translation.en: I suspect you have hypertrophic cardiomyopathy,
which is a genetic enlargement of the--
Well, you'll likely be around a good long time,
but I'm afraid your military prospects end here.
translation.es: ...pero su carrera en el ejército termina aquí.

translation.en: One return ticket to Pittsburgh, please.
translation.es: Un boleto a Pittsburgh, por favor.

translation.en: Miss, you dropped your book! Hey!
- Yes. I saw you dropped it, so I... -
translation.es: Sí. Vi que se le cayó, así que... El maestro y Margarita

translation.en: I'm halfway through reading it. I would hate not knowing how it ends.
translation.es: Voy a la mitad. Quiero saber cómo termina.

translation.en: Oh, here. Why don't you join me?
I'm Otto. It was my father's name.
translation.es: Soy Otto. Así se llamaba mi papá.

translation.en: I'm on my way to visit my father right now.
translation.es: Yo voy a visitar a mi papá.

translation.en: Do you take this train a lot?
Oh, no, I had to come into town for my Army physical.
translation.es: No, vine a mi revisión médica del ejército.

translation.en: Oh, that must be so hard, not knowing what you're gonna face over there.
translation.es: Debe ser difícil no saber lo que enfrentarás allá.

translation.en: - When are you leaving? - I'm not--
I'm afraid you're on the wrong train. This is an eastbound ticket.
translation.es: Tomó el tren equivocado. Este es para el este.

translation.en: I'll get off at the next station.
There you go. Thank you. Have a good day.
Hey, Otto! A little late for your morning rounds, isn't it?
translation.es: ¡Hola, Otto! Es tarde para tu ronda matutina, ¿no?

translation.en: No? Aren't you supposed to be at work?
Oh. Cool. You wanna come over for lunch, then?

translation.es: Ah, cool. ¿Quieres ir a comer? Comer.

translation.en: Well, it's pork tenderloin, in case you change your mind!
translation.es: ¡Hoy hay lomo, por si cambias de opinión!

translation.en: This is a private road, and these gates are to keep down the flow of traffic.
translation.es: Esta calle es privada, las barreras son para impedir el tránsito.

translation.en: Not so idiot drivers can go around them and tear up the grass.
translation.es: No para que unos idiotas las evadan y arruinen el pasto.

translation.en: - - Okay. You got me. I'm with Dye & Merika.
translation.es: Bueno. Me atrapó. Soy de Dye & Merika.

translation.en: I'm gonna have the groundskeeper come down and fix that up for ya, okay?
translation.es: Haré que el encargado venga a arreglarlo, ¿okay?

translation.en: Good as new. Even better. You have a good one now, okay?
translation.es: Como nuevo. Aun mejor. Que tenga un buen día.

translation.en: The rules are here for a reason.
I know what you guys are up to.
Okay, Mr. Anderson. Whatever you say.
translation.es: Sí, Sr. Anderson. Lo que usted diga.

translation.en: - - Get out here, you little bugger!
You throw one more rock, and I swear I'll dropkick that little rat dog of yours right over the roof.
translation.es: Arroja otra piedra y pateo a la rata de tu perro hasta el techo.

translation.en: No, I'm not throwing it at your house. That nasty cat scratched Prince.
translation.es: No la arrojé a su casa. Ese sucio gato arañó a Prince.

translation.en: I'm gonna kill that piece of shit.
translation.es: Voy a matar a esa basura.

translation.en: What do you care? It's feral.
It's probably full of all sorts of disgusting diseases.
So are you, most likely. I don't throw rocks at you.
translation.es: Igual que tú, de seguro. Y no te arrojo piedras.

translation.en: - What's up? - Did you hear what he just said this time?
I told you before about how he talks to me.
translation.es: Ya te había dicho cómo me habla.

translation.en: Get outta here while you can.
Dye & Merika said they'll get all the old people on this street into a home.
translation.es: ¡Dye & Merika meterá a los ancianos a un asilo!

translation.en: I just wanted to bring the wrenches back.
- I found one that came with the furniture. - Congratulations.
And I made you some salpores de arroz.
translation.es: Y le hice salpores de arroz.

translation.en: No. These are Salvadoran cookies. They were my father's favorite, so...
translation.es: No. Son galletas salvadoreñas. Eran las favoritas de mi papá.

translation.en: Also, Otto, I was wondering if you have a ladder I can borrow.
translation.es: Y quería saber si tiene una escalera que me preste.

translation.en: Why do you need a ladder?
Well, it's the one up there.
translation.es: Es que es la de arriba.

translation.en: And you're gonna try to open it from the outside?
I like how his hands are waving.
Uh, Otto, hate to bother you, but, um, we don't have any heat.
translation.es: Otto, disculpa la molestia, pero no tenemos calefacción.

translation.en: Could you come take a look?
How would I go about that?
Well, it's hard to tell the difference sometimes with Otto.
translation.es: A veces es difícil saber con Otto.

translation.en: By the way, we, uh, just moved to 206.
translation.es: Por cierto, nos mudamos a la 206.

translation.en: My husband, Reuben, is the one who used to handle the heat.
translation.es: Mi esposo, Reuben, es el que arreglaba la calefacción.

translation.en: - Okay. - But we always knew a day would come
translation.es: Pero él sabía que llegaría el día en el que no podría...

translation.en: when he wouldn't be able to handle things around the house any longer.
translation.es: Pero él sabía que llegaría el día en el que no podría... ...arreglar las cosas de casa.

translation.en: Maybe Reuben should have thought of that when he organized his coup.
translation.es: Reuben debió pensar en eso cuando organizó su golpe.

translation.en: That was a long time ago.
Otto, can't you just go breathe Anita's radiators for her?
translation.es: Otto, ¿no puedes frenar los radiadores de Anita?

translation.en: No. Because you don't breathe radiators.
translation.es: No. Porque los radiadores no se frenan.

translation.en: - Honey, look at this ramp. - That's Sonya's.
- This is what we needed for the trailer. - Put that down.
Put that down! Who said you could touch that?!
- Sorry. - All of you get outta here. Go, go.
Take your ladder and go. Get outta here. All of you.
translation.es: Tomen la escalera y lárguense. Todos.

translation.en: No. What are you doing in here?
How did you get in here? Come on.
Come on. Go! Get outta there.
No, get out. Get out of there.
You scratch me, I'll bite you.
I loaned you my garden hose last August.
translation.es: Te presté mi manguera en agosto.

translation.en: If you give it back to me, I'll bleed your radiators for you.
translation.es: Si me la devuelves, te dreno los radiadores.

translation.en: So those new neighbors of yours, they seem quite lovely, don't you think?
translation.es: Oye, tus nuevos vecinos son encantadores, ¿no crees?

translation.en: Yeah, well, you may have some more new neighbors soon enough.
translation.es: Bueno, pronto tendrás más vecinos nuevos.

translation.en: The realty people, they've been telling us...
translation.es: Los de la inmobiliaria nos dijeron...

translation.en: Reuben and I have to move out.
translation.es: ...que Reuben y yo tendremos que mudarnos.

translation.en: No, that's a load of crap.
They don't own this house. You do.
Yeah, well, that's what I said.
They, uh, have been talking to our boy, Chris.
translation.es: Han hablado con nuestro hijo, Chris.

translation.en: Now he's saying that I can no longer take care of Reuben,
translation.es: Dice que ya no puedo cuidar a Reuben...

translation.en: that he needs to be in a special care place.
And I should move into a retirement home.
translation.es: Y que yo debo mudarme a un asilo.

translation.en: What does Chris know about it? He's an idiot. He always has been.
translation.es: ¿Qué sabe Chris? Es un idiota. Siempre lo ha sido.

translation.en: They can't make you do anything.
Does he even know we're here?
Let me go find your hose.
The whole neighborhood is falling apart these days.
translation.es: Toda la colonia se está desmoronando.

translation.en: They don't even have a homeowners' association anymore.
translation.es: Ya ni siquiera hay junta de colonos.

translation.en: No one left to keep things running.
translation.es: Ya no hay nadie que se encargue de todo.

translation.en: Now, just to be clear... I still haven't forgiven you.
translation.es: Pero que quede claro, aún no te perdono.

translation.en: I just didn't realize you would fall to shit so quickly.
translation.es: No imaginé que te irías al carajo tan pronto.

translation.en: they're tearing apart everything we worked so hard to build.
translation.es: ...están destruyendo lo que construimos con tanto esfuerzo.

translation.en: I haven't even left yet, and they're trying to erase us.
translation.es: Aún no me he ido y ya quieren eliminarnos.

translation.en: Well, I am not staying around to see that happen.
translation.es: Pero no me quedaré a ver que eso suceda.

translation.en: - For good. - You ready for lunch?
I'm making that creamed corn you like. Oh, thank you.
translation.es: -Tengo la crema de elote que te gusta. -Ah, gracias.

translation.en: Thank you, Otto. I'm sorry it took so long to give it back.
translation.es: Gracias, Otto. Perdón por tardar en devolvértela.

translation.en: Um, you wanna stay for lunch?
Yeah, Anita made a pork tenderloin.
No, I have a lot of things I have to do.
Reuben, what are you doing, hon?
- Let go. - What are you doing?
Try opening it from the inside a little.

translation.es: Es más alto de lo que creí.

translation.en: I'm a little bit dizzy, honey.
Looks like we'll both have to take the next one.
Did you have to go back to the military center?
No, I wanted to pay you back for the train ticket.
Wouldn't it be nicer if you invited me to dinner?
translation.es: ¿No sería mejor que me invitaras a cenar?

translation.en: So, what kinds of things interest you?
I like knowing how things work.
I like knowing how things work.
What each part does to make a car run smoothly.
translation.es: Lo que hace cada parte para que un auto corra.

translation.en: It's more complicated than people realize.
translation.es: Es más complicado de lo que uno cree.

translation.en: A carburetor has to mix gas and air in just the right combination,
translation.es: El carburador debe mezclar gasolina y aire...

translation.en: and then the spark plug has to ignite that mixture,
which drives the piston and the connecting rods and the drive shaft--
translation.es: ...que activa los pistones, las conexiones, el eje y...

translation.en: Where did you learn so much about cars?
It's all we really talked about. He was a good dad.
translation.es: Solo hablábamos de eso. Fue un buen padre.

translation.en: Just how it felt when she was gone.
translation.es: Solo lo que sentí cuando partió.

translation.en: Why didn't you get an entrée?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no pediste un plato fuerte?

translation.en: So you could order whatever you wanted.
translation.es: Para que pidieras lo que quisieras.

translation.en: I'm not in the Army. I couldn't pass my physical.
translation.es: No estoy en el ejército. No aprobé mi examen médico.

translation.en: If I had, at least I'd have a job now, which is what I was counting on.
translation.es: De haberlo hecho, tendría un trabajo, eso esperaba. Pero...

You get the clutch and then press in on the brake.

Clutch and brake. And now brake.
- Don't shout at me. - I am not shouting at you.

Clutch in, and brake. Brake. Brake. Brake.
The car is stopped. Don't hit the car! Brake, brake!

- Just wait for the green light. -
And here we go. So press in on the clutch.

Did you not have to learn how to drive?
Calm down, old man. Hey, hey.

If you honk that horn one more time,

and you are holding that family together.

And learn to share your everything.

I'm, um, looking for Otto Anderson.

Mr. Anderson? My name is Shari Kenzie.

Le salvó la vida a un hombre.

that I can help you clean out your house and clean out the front hall in your home,

translation.en: Don't you say one more word.
Take it easy, Otto. Look, I'm not trying to upset you,
translation.es: Tranquilo, Otto. No es mi intención molestarte...

translation.en: but you really shouldn't be living alone.
I mean, we know more about you than you probably realize, so...
translation.es: Sabemos más de ti de lo que te imaginas.

translation.en: Just look after that heart of yours, okay?
What do you know about my heart?
Hey, what do you know about my heart?!
Otto, what's going on? Are you okay? Do you feel okay?
You wanna help me, close the gate.

translation.es: Se te va a ver linda.

translation.en: There you are. ♪ Of all the things we should've said That we never said ♪
But now we have to live.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to--
The generator blew and the power is out.
translation.es: Explotó el generador, no hay luz.

translation.en: I was hoping you might let me crash on your couch for the night.
translation.es: Quería que me dejara dormir en su sofá.
¿Por qué no vas a tu casa?

translation.en: There's a sofa you can use.
Don't go into the dining room. The ceiling needs repair.
translation.es: No entres al comedor. El techo está arruinado.

translation.en: It's upstairs in Sonya's old study.
translation.es: Ve arriba al estudio de Sonya.

translation.en: So why did he kick you out?
I read too much. I don't like sports. Take your pick.
translation.es: Leo demasiado, no soy deportista. Ya sabe.

translation.en: Good morning. The power's still out
translation.es: Buen día. No ha llegado la luz, quise cocinar...

translation.en: so I cooked up the last of the eggs while they're still good.
translation.es: No ha llegado la luz, quise cocinar... ...para no desperdiciar.

translation.en: I have to do my rounds.
Don't you at least want some coffee first?
You mind if I join you? I need to get my steps in.
- Nice to meet you. - Aw, thanks.
Hey, Otto, if you want to slow down, we can 'cause my beats are up.
translation.es: Otto, más lento, se me acelera el pulso.

translation.en: Otto, did you hear they're moving Reuben into assisted living this afternoon?
translation.es: Otto, ¿sabes que esta tarde llevarán a Reuben a un hogar especial?

translation.en: They convinced Anita to sell the house.
translation.es: Convencieron a Anita de vender la casa.

translation.en: No, they made the deal with Chris.
translation.es: No, hicieron un trato con Chris.

translation.en: - Chris? He can't do that. - Yeah, he can.
translation.es: -¿Chris? No tiene el derecho. -Sí lo tiene.

translation.en: After Dye & Merika found out Anita had Parkinson's,
translation.es: Cuando supieron que Anita tiene Parkinson...

translation.en: So last year Chris convinced Anita to give him power of attorney
translation.es: Hace un año, Anita le dio una carta poder a Chris...

translation.en: So Dye & Merika made the deal with Chris to buy the house.
translation.es: La empresa acordó con Chris comprar la casa.

translation.en: Wait, Anita found out she had Parkinson's last year?
translation.es: Pero, ¿Anita supo que tenía Parkison hace un año?

translation.en: She would've told Sonya. Sonya would've told me.
translation.es: Le habría dicho a Sonya. Y ella me lo habría dicho.

translation.en: Well, Anita and Reuben didn't want you and Sonya to know.
translation.es: Anita y Reuben no querían que ustedes lo supieran.

translation.en: They said you had enough on your plate as it is.
I need to see everything you ever got from Dye & Merika.
translation.es: Quiero ver todo lo referente a Dye & Merika.

translation.en: Notices, letters. Do you have a copy of the power of attorney?
translation.es: Avisos, cartas. ¿Tienes copia de la carta poder?

translation.en: How do you know about that?
And any records of Reuben's condition and yours.
translation.es: Y los registros del padecimiento de Reuben y tuyo.

translation.en: I got so wrapped up in my own troubles, I stopped thinking of anyone else.
translation.es: Me enfrasqué tanto en mis problemas que no vi los de los demás.

translation.en: And I figured they weren't thinking about me.
translation.es: Y creí que yo no les importaba.

translation.en: This isn't easy to say after all this time.
translation.es: Después de años, no es fácil decir esto.

translation.en: And I will sort all this out.
I need to use your phone.
Why can't you use your own?
Mine is disconnected at the moment.
I just need to use your phone, okay?
You won't tell me why your phone is disconnected?
translation.es: ¿No me dices por qué está cancelado tu número?

translation.en: You won't tell me why you need to use my phone?
translation.es: ¿No me dices por qué tienes que usar el mío?

translation.en: You won't tell me what happened to you in the street yesterday?
translation.es: ¿No me dices qué te pasó en la calle ayer?

translation.en: And then you went inside and you wouldn't even open the door?
translation.es: ¿Ni por qué te encerraste y no querías abrir?

translation.en: Do you know how long I was out there?
And I didn't know if something had happened to you.
translation.es: Sin saber si te había pasado algo.

translation.en: Or if something was gonna happen to you.
translation.es: O si te iba a pasar algo.

translation.en: And I'm sorry if I said the wrong thing about Sonya's coats.
translation.es: Y perdón si te ofendí con lo de las cosas de Sonya.

translation.en: But I was just trying to help.
And you left me out there.
translation.es: Y tú me dejaste ahí afuera.

translation.en: So, no. You can't use my phone.
translation.es: Así que no. No puedes usar mi teléfono.

translation.en: You think your life is so hard because everybody's an idiot
translation.es: Crees que tu vida es difícil porque los demás son idiotas...

translation.en: and you have to do everything on your own, right?
translation.es: ...y todo lo tienes que hacer tú, ¿verdad?

translation.en: And I think you should just be happy
that someone was trying to help you get through a crappy day.
translation.es: ...que alguien quiera ayudarte a pasar un mal día.

translation.en: are trying to force Anita and Reuben out of their home.
translation.es: ...quieren sacar a Anita y Reuben de su hogar.

translation.en: That's why I need to use your phone.
We had never had a vacation.
And she wanted to do something special before the baby came.
translation.es: Quería hacer algo especial antes del parto.

translation.en: So we booked a trip to Niagara Falls.
translation.es: Reservamos un viaje a las cataratas del Niágara.

translation.en: On the way back, the bus crashed.
There'd been a recall on the brake lines,
but the company never had them fixed.
After three months, she was finally able to come home.
translation.es: A los 3 meses pudo volver a casa.

translation.en: But they had started building the new condos
translation.es: Pero habían empezado a construir los nuevos condominios...

translation.en: and the community center and the walkways,
none of which were designed for people in wheelchairs.
translation.es: ...nada estaba diseñado para gente en silla de ruedas.

translation.en: The builders could have changed their plans.
translation.es: Los constructores pudieron cambiar sus planes.

translation.en: But the laws weren't in place back then, and they didn't care.
translation.es: Pero no había legislación y a ellos no les importó.

translation.en: - We're putting in a new playground... - I cared.
translation.es: ASOCIACIÓN DE PROPIETARIOS DE BIRCHWOOD Me importó.

translation.en: - There's places for people like your wife. - And I was so angry.
translation.es: -Hay lugares para gente como ella. -Y estaba muy enojado.

translation.en: What does that mean? People like her? What does that mean?
translation.es: ¿De qué habla? ¿Gente como ella? ¿A qué se refiere?

translation.en: - What're you tryin' to say?! - Get off of me!
That's when they voted me out as head of the homeowners' association.
translation.es: Fue cuando me echaron de la junta de colonos.

translation.en: I wanted to obliterate them all.
The builders, and the realtors, and the bus company, the bus driver.
translation.es: Constructores, inmobiliarios y transportistas. Hasta el chofer.

translation.en: I never would have let it go...
translation.es: Yo no lo habría dejado pasar.

translation.en: Sonya said we had to keep living.
Six months ago she passed away.
I was going to join her.
That's why I had them disconnect my phone.
But now I think she wants me to keep living.
translation.es: Pero ahora creo que quiere que sobreviva.

translation.en: And I have things to do.
It's a done deal. Reuben's coming with us.
translation.es: Se acabó. Reuben vendrá con nosotros.

translation.en: And if you get in our way, I'll have you arrested.
translation.es: Y si se entromete, lo arrestarán.

translation.en: - I'm not doing a thing. - Don't you take another step.
translation.es: Yo no haré nada. No de un paso más.

translation.en: You are not taking my husband away from me.
translation.es: No me arrebatará a mi esposo.

translation.en: Anita, please. We're doing this for your own good.
translation.es: Anita, por favor. Hacemos esto por su bien.

translation.en: What you're doing is trying to take my property.
translation.es: Lo que hacen es apoderarse de mi propiedad.

translation.en: I want Reuben to stay right here for the rest of his life,
translation.es: Quiero que Reuben se quede aquí el resto de su vida... DYE & MERIKA DIVISIÓN GERIÁTRICA

translation.en: Okay, but who's gonna take care of Reuben when you're no longer able to?
translation.es: ¿Pero quién cuidará de Reuben cuando usted ya no pueda?

translation.en: Who's gonna take care of you? Otto?
Otto's not in the best health either. Are you, Otto?
translation.es: Él tampoco está en condiciones. ¿Cierto, Otto?

translation.en: - What are you doing? Put that down. - Anita and Reuben are like family to me.
translation.es: ¿Qué hace? Deje eso. Anita y Reuben son como mi familia.

translation.en: I'll take care of them as long as they need.
translation.es: Los cuidaré hasta que sea necesario.

translation.en: Uh, their son, Chris, has decided they're not fit enough to be on their own,
translation.es: Su hijo Chris decidió que no pueden cuidarse solos.

translation.en: and so what we're doing is--
Excuse me. When was the last time Chris saw his parents?
translation.es: Disculpe. ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que Chris vio a sus padres?

translation.en: He lives in Japan. They've been estranged for 10 years.
translation.es: Él vive en Japón. No los ha visto en 10 años.

translation.en: Chris would have no idea how his parents are doing,
translation.es: No sabe cómo están sus padres...

translation.en: except for what you told him.
translation.es: ...más que por lo que usted le dice.
...más que por lo que usted le dice. ¿Y usted quién es?

translation.en: - We're streaming live right now. - Uh...
All right, all right, shut that camera off. You can't film this.
translation.es: A ver... Apaguen la cámara. No pueden grabar.

translation.en: You told Anita's son, Chris, that she had Parkinson's,
translation.es: Usted le dijo a su hijo que ella tenía Parkinson, pero Anita...

translation.en: but Anita never told anyone about her diagnosis.
translation.es: Usted le dijo a su hijo que ella tenía Parkinson, pero Anita... ...nunca le habló a nadie de su diagnóstico.
...nunca le habló a nadie de su diagnóstico. ¿Cómo lo supo usted?

translation.en: I'd have to check the records.
Mr. Anderson over there is something of a local hero.
translation.es: El Sr. Anderson es un héroe local.

translation.en: He tells me you know details about his private health records as well.
translation.es: Me dijo que usted sabe detalles... ...sobre su historial médico privado también.

translation.en: So how are you and your company
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que usted y su compañía...

translation.en: getting illegal access to the medical records of seniors?
translation.es: ...obtienen acceso ilegal a su historial clínico?

translation.en: Okay, let's go. We're done. We're done.
- Get that goddamn camera out of my face. - Goodbye.
- We did it! - Oh, we did!
I first uploaded Anita and Chris's story an hour ago.
translation.es: Subí la historia de Anita... ...y Chris apenas hace una hora.

translation.en: Already dozens of people are saying
translation.es: Y ya hay docenas de personas diciendo...

translation.en: Dye & Merika forced them out of their homes.
translation.es: ...que Dye & Merika los sacaron de sus casas.

translation.en: If you have a story, share it with me at Shari_Kenzie.
translation.es: Si tienen una historia... ...compártanla conmigo en Shari_Kenzie.

translation.en: - I got it. I got it. -
Hey, you forgot to shut the gate!
You see that? He just rolled right over. Gave up.
In our day, the bastards would at least put up a fight.
translation.es: En nuestros tiempos, al menos habrían luchado.

translation.en: They haven't gotten rid of us yet.
translation.es: No se han librado de nosotros.

translation.en: It does feel pretty good. Doesn't it?
Neighborly neighbors, a thing of the past?
Well, I'm here with eyewitnesses Anita and Jimmy to find out more.
translation.es: Vecinos solidarios, ¿cosa del pasado? Estoy con los testigos Anita y Jimmy para saber más.

translation.en: Jimmy, you mentioned that Anita and Reuben are like family to you.
translation.es: Jimmy, dijo que Anita y Reuben son como su familia.

translation.en: Well, I have dinner at their house nearly every single night.
translation.es: Ceno en su casa casi a diario.

translation.en: I know what you're waiting for. You're ready for lunch, aren't you?
translation.es: Ya sé lo que quieres. Quieres comer, ¿verdad?

translation.en: You moved into this community recently.
translation.es: Son nuevos en la comunidad. ¿Cómo les ha ido?

translation.en: - How has that been for you? - It's been beautiful.
translation.es: Son nuevos en la comunidad. ¿Cómo les ha ido? Ha sido hermoso.

translation.en: And your family, to have people there that are--
translation.es: Ha sido hermoso. Y su familia, tener gente aquí que...

translation.en: - Otto? - Will you air this in Mexico?
- Ms. Mendes? You can see him now. - Yes?
Mr. Anderson listed you as next of kin.
translation.es: El Sr. Anderson los puso como familiares.

translation.en: Your uncle had a close call. Has he spoken to you about his condition?
translation.es: Su tío estuvo en riesgo. ¿Les habló de su padecimiento?

translation.en: Basically, his heart is too big.
translation.es: Básicamente, su corazón es demasiado grande.

translation.en: You're really bad at dying, you know that?
Oh, uh, I'm a cardiologist. I'll page OB for you.
translation.es: Yo soy cardióloga. Llamaré a un ginecobstetra.

translation.en: All right. Ready? Everybody say, Marco.
- Hola. Hi! - Hey, Otto. Come in.
Everyone, this is our friend Otto.
translation.es: Oigan, él es nuestro amigo Otto.

translation.en: Sorry, is this about the cars that are in front?
I gave it a fresh coat of paint.
Thank you. Okay, hold him one second, please.
translation.es: Gracias. Cárgalo un momento, por favor.

translation.en: Hold him. Oh, he's gonna cry.
I'll be right back, bebé. Okay.
- - Uh, should I put this thing back in him?
Uh, well, let me show you how this works.
translation.es: Te voy a enseñar cómo funciona.

translation.en: You don't have to do anything.
translation.es: Tú no tienes que hacer nada.

translation.en: Sonya, this is Abbie and Luna. They have something for you.
translation.es: Sonya, ellas son Abbie y Luna, traen algo para ti.

translation.en: - That's, uh, brand- new little Marco there. -
translation.es: Él es el recién llegado Marco.

translation.en: And Marisol, Tommy. I told you about them.
translation.es: Marisol y Tommy. Te hablé de ellos.

translation.en: She loved pink flowers, girls. You chose well.
translation.es: Le encantaban las flores color rosa. Eligieron bien.

translation.en: All right, Malcolm, check that oil. Check it.
And let's see, what does it say?

translation.es: -Listo. -Ya está. Bien, este es el manual.

translation.en: - Oh, my gosh. - Saved you from a Volkswagen.
I have a car! I have a car!
- This is your car! - Are you kidding me?
- Let's go for a ride? - That's a nice truck, Otto.
Yeah? Wait till you see how it rides.
This is like Otto's luchador monster truck.
translation.es: Es la monster truck de luchador de Otto.

translation.en: Yeah. Do you have any comics?
- I can't believe Marco's 3 already. - You're such a big boy.
translation.es: -Es increíble que Marco ya tenga 3. -Estás enorme.
Otto no ha limpiado su acera.

translation.en: if you're reading this, don't worry.
It turns out having a big heart isn't as nice as it sounds.
translation.es: Tener un corazón grande no es tan lindo como suena.

translation.en: The doctors warned me it would get me in the end,
translation.es: Los doctores me advirtieron que llegaría el día...

translation.en: so I planned ahead, that's all.
The cat eats tuna twice a day
translation.es: El gato come atún 2 veces al día...

translation.en: and likes to do his business in private.
translation.es: ...y prefiere hacer sus asuntos en privado.

translation.en: We remember before you this day...
Just a remembrance of some sort...
for those people who thought I pulled my weight.
translation.es: Para la gente que me apreció.

translation.en: A local hero and good friend of the show is being remembered today.
translation.es: Un héroe local y buen amigo del programa, es recordado hoy.

translation.en: Jimmy, would you like to say a few words about Otto?

translation.es: Sí. Otto, te amamos. En tu honor...

translation.en: In your honor, Malcolm and I are doing
translation.es: Otto, te amamos. En tu honor... ...Malcolm y yo haremos tus rondas sin falta...

translation.en: all of your rounds without fail around lunch and on weekdays.
translation.es: ...Malcolm y yo haremos tus rondas sin falta... ...a la hora de la comida y entre semana.

translation.en: My lawyer will give you access to my bank accounts.
translation.es: Mi abogado te dará acceso a mis cuentas bancarias.

translation.en: I never wasted money on crap,
so you'll have enough to get the children through school.
translation.es: ...así que podrás pagar la educación de tus hijos.

translation.en: And do what you like with the rest.
translation.es: DONATIVOS EN MEMORIA DE OTTO ANDERSON Haz lo que quieras con el resto.

translation.en: The house, and everything in it, is yours,
translation.es: La casa y su contenido, son tuyos.

translation.en: so long as you promise never to sell it to those real estate bastards.
translation.es: Si prometes jamás venderla a los inmobiliarios.
...no dejes que Tommy maneje mi camioneta.

translation.en: Or anyone else, for that matter.
I'm trusting it with you alone.
translation.es: Solo te la confío a ti.

translation.en: Because you are not an idiot.
translation.es: Porque tú no eres una idiota.
Si tú o alguien que conoces tiene problemas o pasa por una crisis, hay ayuda disponible.

translation.en: ♪ How your love is the best of me ♪
translation.es: En los EE. UU.: Llama confidencialmente las 24 horas al 988 en crisis o por apoyo emocional.

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, there's so much I want you to know ♪
translation.es: Fuera de los EE. UU.: Visita www.findahelpline.com para encontrar ayuda en tu país.

translation.en: ♪ Guess I'll wait till you're home ♪
translation.es: Haz algo por ti y ayuda a otros.
